name: OPEN FIRE: Nile's Test Drive
description:
Join Niles on his test drive! Face a gauntlet of enemies, collect new weaponry, and get be prepared to Open Fire!

How to play:
  • [WASD] to move.
  • [Shift] to fire loaded weapons
  • [Enter] to fire secondary weapon (Nile's Rifle)
  • [MOUSE] for deck editing and menu navigation
What to expect from this demo:
  • 7 Prebuilt stages
  • 30+ Cards to find, use, and collect
  • Randomized levels after beating the prebuilt stages!
Notes

This is very much in it's Pre Alpha stage. This also marks almost an entire year since I started working on it. Lots of things are very much subject to change, and even more are still going to be added! I would love to hear all kinds of feedback especially on the following.

  • Cards and Enemy Balancing
  • Movement and controls experience.
  • Interface issues problems
  • Sound Mixing Problems/SFX suggestions
  • Full on bugs/hangs issues that need exterminating

If you're curious to see my journey as I made this, you can watch all my process videos here! 

Thanks again so much for playing :) Have a wonderful afternoon and never stop dreaming!
